entry.title: Ensuring security of funds and preserving anonymity when using Bitcoin for e-commerce
entry.summary: Jonathan Patrick wrote a blog post titled "Ensuring security of funds and preserving anonymity when using Bitcoin for e-commerce". The post discusses the importance of ensuring the security of funds and maintaining anonymity when using Bitcoin for e-commerce. He provides detailed information about how to ensure the security of your Bitcoin wallet, including using multi-signature wallets and cold storage. Patrick also explains how to preserve anonymity when using Bitcoin by using multiple wallets and avoiding traceable transactions. He also suggests using Tor or a VPN to increase privacy. Overall, the post aims to provide readers with the necessary knowledge to safely and securely use Bitcoin for e-commerce.The blog post is available at http://jonathanpatrick.me/blog/bitcoin-ecommerce and may be of interest to readers looking for guidance on how to use Bitcoin for e-commerce while maintaining security and anonymity.
